summary: July 1998: Mikiya finds a confused Fujino Asagami crouched in an alley and noticing she is suffering from pain in her abdomen. Mikiya accompanies her to his apartment where she falls asleep... See full summary »
cast: Maaya Sakamoto|Kenichi Suzumura|Takako Honda|Mamiko Noto|Shoji Nakata|Ayumi Fujimura|Yûichi Nakamura|Shintaro Masaki|Hiroki Yasumoto|Hiroshi Iida|Makiko Nitta|Miyu Ootake
title: Gekijô ban Kara no kyôkai: Dai san shô - Tsukakû zanryû
